rules_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
[i]Undergrowth[/i] – When Zariari enters, put X shield counters on Zariari for each creature card in your graveyard. [i](If a permanent with a shield counter on it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
{4}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Hydra Wurm creature token. Put a choice of a vigilance counter, a reach counter, or a trample counter on it.
